name: Planetary Defense (itch) (Thebluedud)
description:
What is Planetary Defense?

Take your seat as governor of a small colony in the far reaches of our galaxy! Your world is a prosperous one, but not everyone is looking to get their slice of the pie fair and square! Develop your Planetary Defense grid to defend your colony from the hordes of raiders roaming this lawless corner of the cosmos in this tower defense game! Can you survive all 7 waves?

Make Use of 4 Types of Towers!

Basic Towers: Short range, but simple and reliable.

Resource Towers: Passively generate income. Critical to your success!

Decoy Towers: Extraordinarily durable distractions.

Missile Towers: Long range with high damage at the cost of fire-rate.

Battle 3 Types of Raider Spacecraft!

Landing Craft: The workhorse of the Raider fleet. Completely unremarkable.

Assault Craft: This baddie will attack any towers it passes by.

Battering Ram:  This behemoth will smash through any tower in its path!

Participate in over 10 Events!

Between waves, you will have to make decisions that could skew the odds in or out of your favor!

Be careful, not every event is so cut and dry!
